verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
as i wait o lord
as i wait on thee
As i wait o lord
you will strengthen me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For you have answered my prayer
you hear my heart
and in the time of trouble
you will hide me, set me on a Rock.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will trust you Lord
put my trust in thee
let me not be moved
but abide in thee
